verses.verse: And God<WH430> remembered<WH2142> Noah,<WH5146> and every<WH3605> living<WH2416> thing, and all<WH3605> the cattle<WH929> that was with him in the ark:<WH8392> and God<WH430> made a wind<WH7307> to pass<WH5674> over<WH5921> the earth,<WH776> and the waters<WH4325> assuaged;<WH7918>
The fountains<WH4599> also of the deep<WH8415> and the windows<WH699> of heaven<WH8064> were stopped,<WH5534> and the rain<WH1653> from heaven<WH8064> was restrained;<WH3607>

And the waters<WH4325> returned<WH7725> from off<WH5921> the earth<WH776> continually:<WH1980> <WH7725> and after the end<WH7097> of the hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> days<WH3117> the waters<WH4325> were abated.<WH2637>
And the ark<WH8392> rested<WH5117> in the seventh<WH7637> month,<WH2320> on<WH5921> the seventeenth<WH7651> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> on the mountains<WH2022> of Ararat.<WH780>

And the waters<WH4325> decreased<WH2637> continually<WH1980> until<WH5704> the tenth<WH6224> month:<WH2320> in the tenth<WH6224> month, on<WH5921> the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> were the tops<WH7218> of the mountains<WH2022> seen.<WH7200>
And it came<WH1961> to pass at the end<WH7093> of forty<WH705> days,<WH3117> that Noah<WH5146> opened<WH6605> the window<WH2474> of the ark<WH8392> which<WH834> he had made:<WH6213>
And he sent<WH7971> forth a raven,<WH6158> which went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to and fro,<WH7725> until<WH5704> the waters<WH4325> were dried<WH3001> up from off<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>
Also he sent<WH7971> forth a dove<WH3123> from him, to see<WH7200> if the waters<WH4325> were abated<WH7043> from off<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the ground;<WH127>

But the dove<WH3123> found<WH4672> no<WH3808> rest<WH4494> for the sole<WH3709> of her foot,<WH7272> and she returned<WH7725> to him into<WH413> the ark,<WH8392> for the waters<WH4325> were on<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the whole<WH3605> earth:<WH776> then he put<WH7971> forth<WH7971> his hand,<WH3027> and took<WH3947> her, and pulled<WH935> her in to him into<WH413> the ark.<WH8392>
And he stayed<WH2342> yet other<WH312> seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and again<WH3254> he sent<WH7971> forth the dove<WH3123> out of the ark;<WH8392>

And the dove<WH3123> came<WH935> in to him in the evening;<WH6153> and, see,<WH2009> in her mouth<WH6310> was an olive<WH2132> leaf<WH5929> plucked<WH2965> off: so Noah<WH5146> knew<WH3045> that the waters<WH4325> were abated<WH7043> from off<WH5921> the earth.<WH776>
And he stayed<WH3176> yet other<WH312> seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and sent<WH7971> forth the dove;<WH3123> which returned<WH7725> not again<WH3254> to him any<WH5750> more.<WH5750>

And it came<WH1961> to pass in the six<WH8337> hundredth<WH3967> and first<WH259> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH259> month, the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> the waters<WH4325> were dried<WH2717> up from off<WH5921> the earth:<WH776> and Noah<WH5146> removed<WH5493> the covering<WH4372> of the ark,<WH8392> and looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> the face<WH6440> of the ground<WH127> was dry.<WH2720>
And in the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> on the seven<WH7651> and twentieth<WH6242> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> was the earth<WH776> dried.<WH3001>
And God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> to Noah,<WH5146> saying,<WH559>
Go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> of the ark,<WH8392> you, and your wife,<WH802> and your sons,<WH1121> and your sons' <WH1121>wives<WH802> with you.

Bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> with you every<WH3605> living<WH2416> thing that is with you, of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> both of fowl,<WH5775> and of cattle,<WH929> and of every<WH3605> creeping<WH7431> thing that creeps<WH7430> on the earth;<WH776> that they may breed<WH8317> abundantly<WH8317> in the earth,<WH776> and be fruitful,<WH6509> and multiply<WH7235> on the earth.<WH776>
And Noah<WH5146> went<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and his sons,<WH1121> and his wife,<WH802> and his sons' <WH1121>wives<WH802> with him:

Every<WH3605> beast,<WH2416> every<WH3605> creeping<WH7431> thing, and every<WH3605> fowl,<WH5775> and whatever<WH3605> creeps<WH7430> on the earth,<WH776> after their kinds,<WH4940> went<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of the ark.<WH8392>

And Noah<WH5146> built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> to the LORD;<WH3068> and took<WH3947> of every<WH3605> clean<WH2889> beast,<WH929> and of every<WH3605> clean<WH2889> fowl,<WH5775> and offered<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings on the altar.<WH4196>

And the LORD<WH3068> smelled<WH7306> a sweet<WH5207> smell;<WH7381> and the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> I will not again<WH3254> curse<WH7043> the ground<WH127> any<WH5750> more<WH5750> for man's<WH120> sake;<WH5668> for the imagination<WH3336> of man's<WH120> heart<WH3820> is evil<WH7451> from his youth;<WH5271> neither<WH3808> will I again<WH3254> smite<WH5221> any<WH5750> more<WH5750> every<WH3605> thing living,<WH2416> as I have done.<WH6213>

While<WH5750> the earth<WH776> remains,<WH3117> seedtime<WH2233> and harvest,<WH7105> and cold<WH7120> and heat,<WH2527> and summer<WH7019> and winter,<WH2779> and day<WH3117> and night<WH3915> shall not cease.<WH7673>
